description: Context schema for OSS terraform modules, VM instances and application events

applicationVersion.description: The version of the application e.g. 1.0.0

autoGeneratedId.description: ID automatically generated upon running a modules deployment script. Intended to identify each independent module, and the infrastructure it controls.

cloud.description: The cloud, either AWS or GCP

instanceId.description: A unique identifier for the VM instance. Unique for each instance of the app running within a module.

moduleName.description: The name of the terraform module

moduleVersion.description: The version of the terraform module e.g. 1.0.0

region.description: The region the services are running in

userProvidedId.description: Optional ID provided by user as an input to each terraform module. Intended to tie events together across modules, infrastructure and apps when used consistently.
